name: Soul Exchange - A Form Changing Platformer
name_original: Soul Exchange - A Form Changing Platformer
description:
Use WASD to move! Don't use arrow keys, it makes swapping so hard.

LSHIFT to sprint

SPACE to jump (if able)

T or P to swap (when available)

Ctrl+R to hard reset the game

Post-jam version of our Ludum Dare 44 entry! https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/44/soul-exchange

It is possible to get stuck on the top of the screen sometimes when transforming. If this happens to you, transform again to get unstuck!
